Title: Raising a Stink
Description:
Those clues add up to an ugly story, $n.

That map shows the Crown's got a heavily guarded base of operations in Silverpine Forest. And between that memo and formula, it looks like they're cooking up something intoxicatingly toxic.

I've got a guy that can get us some... artisanal goods... to deal with the Crown. I'll go talk to him and meet you outside Shadowfang Keep.
ObjectivesText: Meet Inspector Snagglebolt at the entrance to Shadowfang Keep in Silverpine Forest.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Inspector Snagglebolt at the entrance to Shadowfang Keep.
